title: Lucia di Lammermoor
creator_credit: Peter Butler, John Copley, ABC-TV (Australia) and Opera Australia
brief_description: Dame Joan Sutherland brings to life Donizetti’s tragic heroine who murders her bridegroom on their wedding night. This breathtaking production by the Australian Opera also features Richard Greager and Malcolm Donnelly. The production was recorded live at the Sydney Opera House, February 8, 1986.
